titleStmt.title: Cœlum Britanicum A masque at White-Hall in the Banquetting-House, on Shrove-Tuesday-night, the 18. of February, 1633.
Cœlum Britannicum
titleStmt.author: Carew, Thomas, 1595?-1639?
Bruno, Giordano, 1548-1600. Spaccio de la bestia trionfante.
Jones, Inigo, 1573-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas VValkley, and are to be sold at his shop neare White-Hall,

notesStmt.note: The designer for the masque was Inigo Jones, whose name appears on the internal title page for "Cœlum Britannicum" in subsequent editions of Carew's works.
Based in part on: Bruno, Giordano. Spaccio de la bestia trionfante.
Most of the sheets are in two settings, and C outer forme and D inner forme are in three. Some copies have final pages numbered 31, 32, 30, 28, 29.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
